text: For purpose of proper administration of this chapter and to prevent evasion of the tax hereby imposed, it shall be presumed that all transfers of real property are taxable and the burden shall be upon the taxpayer to show that a transfer is exempt from tax.
historical:

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)
